mapper.select: select distinct target_system from nexclipper_rule order by target_system asc
select distinct target_system from nexclipper_metric order by target_system asc

select target ,metric ,target_system ,`condition` ,notify ,`status` ,( select alias from nexclipper_metric where target = a.target and target_system = a.target_system and metric = a.metric ) alias ,slack_token ,slack_channel ,severity ,message from nexclipper_rule a where idx = #{idx}
